description:

Outer material: textile + thermoplastic polyurethane. Inner material: textile. Sole: rubber 
  

  
Sole material 
  
Rubber 
  

  
Shaft height 
  
Knöchel

Textile 
  
   About this item   Modern design: this Kempa shoe is versatile - as a modern trainer, indoor and handball shoe, fitness shoe in the gym, trainers or jogging shoes - both indoors and outdoors. The shoe performs in all activities, is ultra light and particularly breathable thanks to the upper material made of mesh fabric. The feet can breathe freely and the athlete has no feeling of moisture or heat. Non-slip thanks to soles by Michelin: Inspired by Michelin racing tyres, the innovative rubber compound of our sole gives excellent performance in terms of grip and durability. Ideal for sports in the hall. The rubber sole does not stain. Cushioning thanks to Kinetic power: the lightweight EVA cushioning with built-in soft pad ensures comfortable wearing comfort throughout the day - and the shoe also provides excellent shock absorption during sports. This protects the joints of the athlete and still ensures a powerful impression. Stability thanks to torsion support: the midfoot support offers outstanding stability and ergonomic rolling movements. It supports rotation between the back and forefoot. Thus, the wearer of the shoe is happy about more control and optimised power transmission. Flexible thanks to soft fit: the elastic inner sock ensures comfortable wearing all day, which makes the Kempa trainer so flexible and versatile. The highest wearing conform is therefore very important, especially since the shoe is also incredibly light. Ideal as a jogging shoe, outdoor shoe, walking shoe, casual shoes, athletics, handball, school, walk, marathon and many more.   See more About this item

title: yanopurna Cashmere Scarf - Made of 100% Cashmere Wool, 68 x 190 cm, Cashmere Scarf in Plain, Handwoven from Nepal, Unisex, Hand Wash, White grey, One Size
description:
Product details  

  
Care instructions 
  
Hand Wash Only 
  
   About this item   Luxury material: carefully hand-woven cashmere scarf, made from 100% pure cashmere wool. Each scarf is designed to feel incredibly soft and gentle against the skin, embodying the unparalleled elegance and warmth that Cashmere is known for. This scarf is not just an accessory; it is a statement that will add style and glamour to any wardrobe. Versatile styling options: One of the outstanding features of this cashmere scarf is its versatility. It can be worn in different ways, e.g. Elegantly wrapped as a scarf, casual loop style, as a tube scarf or draped open. This flexibility allows you to match the scarf to different outfits and occasions, whether you prefer an elegant look or a casual, relaxed style. Easy care instructions: preserve the flawless quality of your cashmere scarf with our simple care instructions. For best results, hand wash the scarf in lukewarm water or use a very gentle wool program without spinning. This ensures that the softness and durability of the cashmere is retained, so you can enjoy your scarf for many years to come. [ EXTENSIVE COLOR CHOICE ] - The Yanopurna collection includes a wide range of scarves, hats and blankets available in a wide range of colours, from aesthetic natural colours to bright pink tones. Whether you prefer subtle, neutral tones or bold, eye-catching colours, there is the right choice for every taste and occasion. This extensive range ensures that you will find the perfect accessory to complement your personal style. Perfect as a gift: the luxurious elegance and warmth of this cashmere scarf make it an ideal gift for any occasion. Yanopurna's commitment to sustainability stands for fair production in small, local family businesses in Nepal. We not only support artisans, but also ensure that this work has a positive impact on the community and the environment.   See more About this item
